item.description:
Brunch At Christopher's near Porter square - Good times, relax, mingle and enjoy.

On Sunday parking is free so no fret.

Brunch will be served upstairs on the second floor.

Reservations will be under Jo-Ann Keith.

Good times are here to stay, relax, live, enjoy meet new people young, old whatever just come out and enjoy the food and life.

Visit http://www.christophe...
for their brunch menu and directions.

If people are still interested after the 25 there will be room for 35 but it has to be a yes to email me at www.stinkysgrooming @msn.com
No later than July 30 at 1 pm .
Thanks - Jo-Ann

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday Brunch At Christopher's Restaurant & Bar
